title: Dear Maude
description: Alternate cover edition for ASIN B00OSHOI1IFor other cover editions see here and hereLife's all about choices. And Emily Stanton thought she made a wise one when she accepted a scholarship that allowed her to attend college for free. Now a senior, she must face the reality of her decision and the looming requirement to work for the mysterious company that funded her education. This is the account of Emily's journey into an unknown and unfamiliar world, where a journal she addresses to her deceased aunt and the powerful secrets it contains becomes her only link to the life she once knew.
author: Denise Liebig
